page.title: 06Transport
page.content: In our survey of the older children of Bishop Pursglove Primary School we found out that 94.6% of the families had a car.This is probably because Tideswell is not very near to any big town.Sheffield is about 16 miles away, Chesterfield 17 and Manchester 30 miles away.38% of families have motor bikes.98.2% have at least one bicycle. Most of the bicycles belonged to children,though a few belonged to adults.There are bus services through Tideswell,to Chesterfield,Sheffield, Buxton and Manchester, but only 12.5% of the children use buses at least once a week. Some common makes of cars owned by by Tideswell people are Ford Renault Vauxhall B.M.W. Austin Rover Land Rover Mini Datsun/Nissan Skoda Volkswagon Subaru.
